python.add.def:
def add(a, b):
  return a + b

python.sub.def:
def sub(a, b):
  return a - b

python.mul.def:
def mul(a, b):
  return a * b

python.div.def:
def div(a, b):
  return a / b

python.pow.def:
def power(a, b):
  return math.pow(a, b)

python.mod.def:
def mod(a, b):
  return a % b

python.gcd.def:
def gcd(a, b):
 return math.gcd(a, b)

python.bit_and.def:
def bit_and(a, b):
  return a & b

python.bit_or.def:
def bit_or(a, b):
  return a | b

python.bit_xor.def:
def bit_xor(a, b):
  return a ^ b
